name: Ninja64
description:
This is my entry for the LOWREZJAM'19.

  As a ninja , you have to fight the enormous creatures which attack the city. Good luck!

 

 Use the left and right arrow buttons to walk, the up arrow to jump, and the spacebar to shoot.

 Game developed with Godot Engine.

 The source code can be downloaded from: https://github.com/jjramos-dev/ninja64

 The license of the game is GPL 3.0, and CC-by 4.0. Third party assets has their own licenses (as the music, from TwinMusicom.org, and the OSL fonts).
